channel.title: Questions about {317}
channel.description:
Okay, becuase i don't want to take up alot of room making other threads, i'm gonna ask all my questions in this one. Please answer my questions in an easy to understand way because i'm not an expert coder.
Q.1 : How do i edit what npc's say? I know how to autospawn them but have no clue on how to make them talk.
Q.2 : How do i move banks and portals around, and how to i change where portals lead to?
Q.3 : How do I change mod/admin icons. My source's current mod/admin icons are weird, i'd like the original kind(the kind most servers use).
Q.4 : How do I change login place(starter destination)?
Q.4 : How do i change what items new players get on arrival(starter items)?
Q.5 : On my source(joe-scape/all-star-scape), the emotes section it jacked up. Where emotes would have been, there are a series of teleports and magic attacks, how do i change it back to normal?
Q.6 : How do i change the login interface(the thing you enter your username and password to log in with, mine is weird....i want the original one)?
Q.7 : How do i get the option upon loggin of new players, to change hairstyles and cloths etc.?
Q.8 : how do i edit where players can pk?
To anybody who answers all my questions, thankyou.

item.title: Questions about {317}
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You can change your Home in player.java & Starter items, if you want to change what they get when they first login to your server thats in client.java @back to your home question, where your home is login and do ::mypos then, go into player.java remove that, then go to where you want your new home go to edgeville for example then do ::mypos and get the coords replace your old coords with the new one.

Note: this is a quicky sorry if it does not make any sense just in a hurry.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about {317}
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

  1. Uhm texthandler? npc handler? one of them or something like that >.>
  2. Global object + client.java i think
  3. Client sprites i think?
  4. playerhandler or client.java :\
  5. don’t know…
  6. its all about the client
  7. load the interface :\
  8. wildy booleans or whatever

Yeh well i dunno

Read full topic
